quality._c2: Maximum number of items each Item Trader can render (per-trade) as stock. Lower to decrease client-lag in trader-rich areas.
quality._c3: Setting to 0 will disable item rendering entirely, so use with caution.

wallet_slot._c6: The position in the menu where the wallet slot will be placed at in the players inventory.
wallet_slot._c7: The position in the menu where the wallet slot will be placed at in the players creative inventory.
wallet_slot._c8: The offset that the wallet button should be placed at relative to the wallet slot position.

inventory_buttons._c10: The position on the menu that the notification & team manager buttons will be placed at in the players inventory.
inventory_buttons._c11: The position on the menu that the notification & team manager buttons will be placed at in the players creative inventory.

notification._c13: Whether notifications should be posted in your chat when you receive them.

sounds._c15: Whether Money Mending should make a noise when triggered.
